title: 'Connected' sans serif fonts
content:
Hi folks,

Can anyone recommend any chunky sans serif fonts that are 'connected'. Most connected fonts are serif, I am looking for a strong and bold sans serif.

Appreciate any recommendations.
author: reboot

comments.content:
Not entirely connected, but in the ballpark...
